points: Building solutions for retail clients to integrate their existing software with Salesforce through [b]API integrations[/b].
[b]Developing a PayPal Payment Processor[/b] that can be connected to Salesforce.
[b]Creating dashboards[/b] for clients to better visualize their customer data and behaviour, improving sales and retention.
Building [b]web platforms[/b] for clients to digitize their business.
[b]Tech stack[/b]: Apex, Django, Express (Node.js)
Developed the [b]national website[/b] for AIESEC in Switzerland, at [link=https://aiesec.ch=link]https://aiesec.ch[/link], integrated with the AIESEC global GraphQL APIs.

Developed an [link=https://impactbrazil.raitech.org=link]internal web platform[/link] to increase the outreach of AIESEC in Brazil, by displaying relevant opportunities to youth who wish to visit Brazil on an exchange.
System admin for [b]AWS[/b] - worked with EC2, RDS, Route 53, Lambda.
[b]Tech stack[/b]: Django (Python), Vue.js (JavaScript), PostgreSQL

Led the team that [b]developed AIESEC’s internal system to facilitate sending youth on international exchange, cutting the time it takes from a customer to apply to an opportunity till they get approved by 17.45%.
[b]Developed online payment systems[/b] using Adyen as a payment provider, improving cash flow.

Enabled faster planning of data-driven strategies by [b]developing a bot that regularly extracts data from our PostgreSQL databases[/b] and sends a detailed analysis through Slack, cutting 20+ hrs/week of IT workload.

[b]Extracted and analyzed data[/b] from a PostgreSQL database of our 100k+ users on system with 1 million+ key user interactions, leading to better understanding of data intelligence within the management.
Revamped AIESEC’s internal [b]analytics visualization tools[/b] for better performance analysis.
[b]Tech stack[/b]: Ruby, PostgreSQL, Angular
[b]Lead developer[/b] on the team that worked on identifying bottlenecks and building strategies around improving performance.
[b]Built dashboards with performance data[/b], which led to AIESEC in India growing in operations by 16.59%.
Developed Lead Management and Membership Management portals that led to [b]availability of lead conversion and membership retention data[/b] through API integrations with AIESEC’s global platform.
Saved 40 hrs/week of operations by [b]automating data acquisition into spreadsheets[/b] using the G Suite API.
[b]Tech stack[/b]: PHP, Express (Node.js)
Cut the time it takes an employee to be recruited into the local chapter from over a month to 2 weeks, by completely [b]digitalizing the previously offline recruitment process[/b].
Led the team that was responsible for [b]building lead tracking and analysis tools[/b] for AIESEC in Mumbai’s sales department, [b]quadrupling our lead to customer conversion[/b].
